data.name: Saloon Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Check It Out

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1982080/Animal_Shelter__Puppies__Kittens_DLC/https://store.steampowered.com/app/1151380/Cowboy_Life_Simulator/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1825210/DESTRUCTURE_Among_Debris/https://store.steampowered.com/app/1903510/Technicity_Prologue/




America, 19th century after the Civil War. Sand dunes, hot sun and galloping horses - feel it all while holding a portion of Tequila on ice in your hand. Take on the challenge of rebuilding an old saloon in the heart of the Wild West and become a pioneer in the liquor business in the process.

Up and down - restore, match, build




Not everything went your way; you were cheated, but don't worry! Your longed-for paradise is closer than ever - refresh the ruined interior and repair the damaged furnishings. Purchase the most necessary equipment, stock up on alcohol and start designing the saloon to your liking. Just remember, money is not manna from heaven - ill-considered purchases are not necessarily advisable here!

You make the rules here now!




You are the owner of a ruined Saloon. Make the wooden walls once again become a place of bustling meetings with a lot of alcohol. Attract customers and fulfill their expectations with the utmost care, while learning about drink recipes or various types of alcohol inspired by 19th century America. But that's not all, your task will also be to provide an atmospheric decor, and thus maintain order.

Let everyone know




Earn reputation points and attract more and more customers. Make your new guests want to come back again and again with generous tips. Create the most recognizable business in the Wild West.

Manage a real Saloon




Serving drinks or preparing food is a hard and time-consuming job, but it becomes impossible without prior preparation of the logistical background. Plan your orders in advance and keep your saloon stocked. Increase your business capital through negotiations.

Expand your business




Expand your Saloon - unlock new equipment or rooms. Establish new relationships with characters and reap the benefits of them, all to help your business thrive.

Build relationships and explore the world




The 19th-century West beyond the sand dunes and hot sun offers history-soaked grounds and a variety of activities. As the day begins to head west, while holding a glass of cold Tequila, take a look at what the area outside the Saloon has to offer, as well as its residents, whose favor will make your life easier more than once or twice.


 

Core mechanics


  • Saloon Expansion and Customization
  • Many opportunities to grow your business from serving liquor to preparing food or accommodating guests (who may not always have pure intentions)
  • Extraordinary events during the game
  • Exploring the world beyond your saloon
  • A wide range of customers with diverse needs
  • Various possibilities of character development

data.short_description: An abandoned Saloon is waiting for you to restore its former glory. Find out that managing a saloon isn't just about creating drinks and meals. Clean up, organize, and choose the right friends - all to become the most recognizable business in the Wild West!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 10100f / Ryzen 3400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 4GB / AMD Radeon RX 460 4GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400f / Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
